These lessons are fantastic.  The instructor doesn't have much of a way with words, but he knows what he's doing and makes it very easy to learn.  The first three lessons alone will improve any and all subsequent figures you draw!

Thanks for this f-ART!  And thanks for the links alacanthrou!

Personally, I've bought the DvD's, and they are honestly worth the price. You are basically taking a full art course in the human structure, it is an amazing set of videos, that explain everything in simple english. My recommendation, buy the videos, they are worth the price.

@Captain_Abortion    I would buy if I had the money. Since I don't I use torrents. But out of curiosity, if you paid for the videos why are you here looking for them on TPB?
